DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator to determine whether an institutional pathology report was submitted with the form.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination._A short textual account; having provided a short account._Referred for judgment or consideration; handed over.
